name: MVVMToolkit
summary: A modern, fast, modular MVVM library and part of the Windows Community Toolkit.
author: Microsoft Community

name: MVVMBasic
summary: This is a generic version of a MVVM pattern. The Model-View-ViewModel pattern can be used on all XAML platforms.
author: Microsoft

name: MVVMLight
summary: MVVM Light is a popular, 3rd party framework based on the Model-View-ViewModel pattern.
author: Laurent Bugnion

name: CodeBehind
summary: This is the traditional model for an application where logic is handled in the code-behind.
author: Microsoft

name: CaliburnMicro
summary: Caliburn.Micro is a popular MVVM framework emphasizing conventions and composability.
author: Nigel Sampson

name: Prism
summary: Prism is a framework for building loosely coupled, maintainable, and testable XAML applications.
author: Brian Lagunas, Bart Lannoeye, Dan Siegel
